name: Disruptive
description:
Disruptive technologies drastically change what it means to compete in a particular space. We've built a methodology and a team that we're eager to apply in helping our customers shake things up.
What we do: We are software engineers, designers, and product managers with an appreciation of great design and a powerful user experience. We design and build high quality "Apps" for iPhone, iPad, Android and the web.
Why: Because we're tired of seeing great ideas fall prey to poor implementations. We're inspired by the great work of our peers in the industry, and we feel we have something even better to contribute. Because our customers have great ideas, and we can only succeed if you do.
